name: UK News
description: Comprehensive UK news service with headlines, breaking news, regional coverage, and analysis

tools.name: get_uk_headlines
tools.description: Get the latest UK news headlines from major news sources

source.description: News source to fetch from (default: all)

category.description: News category to filter by (default: all)

limit.description: Maximum number of headlines to return (default: 10)

tools.name: search_uk_news
tools.description: Search UK news articles by keywords or topics

query.description: Search query or keywords to look for in news articles

source.description: News source to search in (default: all)

days.description: Number of days back to search (default: 7)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

tools.name: get_breaking_news
tools.description: Get breaking news alerts and urgent UK news updates

limit.description: Maximum number of breaking news items to return (default: 5)

tools.name: get_news_by_region
tools.description: Get news specific to UK regions (England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland)

region.description: UK region to get news for

limit.description: Maximum number of articles to return (default: 10)

tools.name: get_news_analysis
tools.description: Get in-depth analysis and opinion pieces on UK news topics

topic.description: Topic or subject for analysis (e.g., "Brexit", "Climate Change", "Economy")

limit.description: Maximum number of analysis articles to return (default: 5)

tools.name: get_weather_news
tools.description: Get UK weather-related news and forecasts

region.description: UK region for weather news (default: all)

limit.description: Maximum number of weather news items to return (default: 5)

examples.prompt: Get the latest UK headlines from BBC
Search for news about climate change
What's the weather news for England?
